meanings.definition: A structure of hexagonal cells made by bees out of beeswax to store honey and larvae.
meanings.sent1: The honeycomb in the beehive is where the bees keep their honey.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful honeycomb hanging from a tree in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The bees were so proud of their perfectly shaped honeycomb.
meanings.sent4: The honeycomb glistened in the sunlight like a golden treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The hexagonal pattern of the honeycomb is nature's masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A structure of hexagonal cells made by humans out of various materials for decorative or functional purposes.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a unique honeycomb design using wooden blocks.
meanings.sent2: The honeycomb pattern on the wall added a modern touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The honeycomb-shaped shelves were both stylish and practical.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knew no bounds as she crafted a honeycomb mirror.
meanings.sent5: The honeycomb structure of the lampshade cast intricate shadows on the ceiling.
